citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm on
22-Aug-17.
While at the facility, called licensee and left message, talked to a family member who let me know the licensee
wouldn't be available for inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm on
22-Aug-17.
While at the facility, called licensee and left message, talked to a family member who let me know the licensee
wouldn't be available for inspection.
